title: Beach Condo Water Damage Restoration
summary: Following a successful house remodel, client hired Behr for beach condo restoration after significant water damage: replaced drywall/electrical in half the building, all plumbing fixtures, flooring, and painted everything. behrconstruction+1
outcome: Completed on schedule and agreed cost; same reliable subs/personnel reused; workers considerate of tight parking/neighbors; quality met/exceeded expectations with one-year guarantee. behrconstruction+1
